test.test_name: IG Icon View Links need aria-labels
test.query_clob:
with aapi as (
        select case when (lower(trim(icon_view_link_attributes)) not like '%aria-label%') 
                    then 'N' 
                    else 'Y'
                    end pass_yn,
               page_id,
               application_id,
               icon_view_link_attributes,
               workspace,
               last_updated_by,
               last_updated_on,
               region_name,
               interactive_grid_id
         from apex_appl_page_igs
         where icon_view_icon_attributes is not null
    )
select aapi.pass_yn,
       aapi.workspace,
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` (app %1, page %2) icon view is missing aria-label : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.icon_view_link_attributes) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` icon view is missing an aria-label (app %1, page %2, grid id %3)', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
				p3 => aapi.interactive_grid_id) issue_title,
       aapi.interactive_grid_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.region_name
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
Links must have aria-labels so that screen-readers can correctly identify their purpose.

Note: There is debate about whether the addition of a `title` tag is beneficial.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.4.4(A) : Link Purpose (In Context) :  
    The purpose of each link can be determined from the link text alone or from the link text together with its programmatically determined link context, except where the purpose of the link would be ambiguous to users in general.
